widget.label: Instagram Slider
widget.description: List of Photos on Instagram Account

parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Title
parameter.description: All options of the FlexSlider is here

parameter.name: reverse
parameter.label: Reverse
parameter.description: Boolean: Reverse the animation direction. Default: false.

parameter.name: animation_loop
parameter.label: Animation loop
parameter.description: Boolean: Gives the slider a seamless infinite loop. Default: true.

parameter.name: smooth_height
parameter.label: Smooth Height
parameter.description: Boolean: Animate the height of the slider smoothly for slides of varying height. Default: false.

parameter.name: start_at
parameter.label: Start At
parameter.description: Number: The starting slide for the slider, in array notation. Default: 0.

parameter.name: slideshow
parameter.label: Slide Show
parameter.description: Boolean: Setup a slideshow for the slider to animate automatically. Default: true.

parameter.name: slide_show_speed
parameter.label: Slide show speed (ms)
parameter.description: Number: Set the speed of the slideshow cycling, in milliseconds. Default: 7000.

parameter.name: animation_speed
parameter.label: Animation speed (ms)
parameter.description: Number: Set the speed of animations, in milliseconds. Default: 600.

parameter.name: init_delay
parameter.label: Init Delay(ms)
parameter.description: Number: Set an initialization delay, in milliseconds. Default: 0.

parameter.name: randomize
parameter.label: Randomize
parameter.description: Boolean: Randomize slide order, on load. Default: false.

parameter.name: pause_on_action
parameter.label: Pause On Action
parameter.description: Boolean: Pause the slideshow when interacting with control elements. Default: true.

parameter.name: pause_on_hover
parameter.label: Pause On Hover
parameter.description: Boolean: Pause the slideshow when hovering over slider, then resume when no longer hovering. Default: false.

parameter.name: useCSS
parameter.label: Use CSS
parameter.description: Boolean: Slider will use CSS3 transitions, if available. Default: true.

parameter.name: touch
parameter.label: Allow touch swipe navigation
parameter.description: Boolean: Allow touch swipe navigation of the slider on enabled devices. Default: true.

parameter.name: video
parameter.label: Video
parameter.description: Boolean: Will prevent use of CSS3 3D Transforms, avoiding graphical glitches. Default: false.

parameter.name: control_nav
parameter.label: Control Nav
parameter.description: Boolean: Create navigation for paging control of each slide. Default: true.

parameter.name: direction_nav
parameter.label: Direction Nav
parameter.description: Boolean: Create previous/next arrow navigation. Default: true.

parameter.name: keyboard
parameter.label: Keyboard
parameter.description: Boolean: Allow slider navigating via keyboard left/right keys. Default: true.

parameter.name: multiple_keyboard
parameter.label: Multiple Keyboard
parameter.description: Boolean: Allow keyboard navigation to affect multiple sliders. Default: false.

parameter.name: mousewheel
parameter.label: Mousewheel
parameter.description: Boolean: (Dependency) Allows slider navigating via mousewheel. Default: false.

parameter.name: pause_play
parameter.label: Pause Play
parameter.description: Boolean: Create pause/play element to control slider slideshow. Default: false.

parameter.name: pause_text
parameter.label: Pause Text
parameter.description: String: Set the text for the "pause" pausePlay item. Default: Pause.

parameter.name: play_text
parameter.label: Play Text
parameter.description: String: Set the text for the "play" pausePlay item. Default: Play.

parameter.name: item_width
parameter.label: Item Width
parameter.description: Number: Box-model width of individual carousel items, including horizontal borders and padding. Default: 0.

parameter.name: item_margin
parameter.label: Item Margin
parameter.description: Number: Margin between carousel items. Default: 0.

parameter.name: min_items
parameter.label: Min Items
parameter.description: Number: Minimum number of carousel items that should be visible. Default: 0.

parameter.name: max_items
parameter.label: Max Items
parameter.description: Number: Maximum number of carousel items that should be visible. Default: 0.

parameter.name: total_pages
parameter.label: Total Pages
parameter.description: Number: Total pages of carousel. Default: Maximum.

parameter.name: move
parameter.label: Move
parameter.description: Number: Number of carousel items that should move on animation. Default: 0.

parameter.name: rtl
parameter.label: RTL
parameter.description: Boolean: Supports RTL functionality in the slider. Default: false.
